dcterms:description: A simulator developed for the study to generate data for training the RL agent, simulating the arrival of passengers of different classes wishing to book tickets for flights.
dcterms:title: Air Travel Market Simulator

dcterms:description: Data used for training the RL agent to capture the change in demand of passengers resulting from the agent taking exploratory actions.
dcterms:title: Historical Booking Data

dcterms:creator: J. Subramanian
S. Stidham Jr
C. J. Lautenbacher
dcterms:description: An airline dataset used to confirm the computational feasibility of the model, addressing the seat allocation problem with overbooking, cancellations, and no-shows.
dcterms:title: Airline Dataset (used by Subramanian et al.)

dcterms:creator: A. Gosavi
N. Bandla
T. K. Das
dcterms:description: Historical booking data used to formulate a similar problem with different assumptions regarding cancellations and modeled as a Semi Markov Decision Process.
dcterms:title: Historical Booking Data (used by Gosavi et al.)

dcterms:description: A theoretical construct used for comparison in the study to evaluate the performance of the RL agent.
dcterms:title: Theoretical Optimal Revenue Data
